alert.note: Alert for Rockingham (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 10:28PM EST until January 10 at 2:23PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Carolina...Virginia... Dan River Near Wentworth affecting Rockingham County. Dan River at Dan River at Paces affecting Halifax County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Virginia...North Carolina... Dan River near Danville affecting Pittsylvania, Caswell, and Rockingham Counties, as well as the City of Danville. Dan River at South Boston affecting Halifax County. For the Dan River...including Wentworth, STP near Danville, Dan River at Paces, South Boston...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Dan River near Wentworth. * WHEN...From this evening to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 19.5 feet, Dan Valley Road and River Road in Madison are closed by floodwaters. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 19.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 18.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:30 PM EST Tuesday was 19.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 19.9 feet just after midnight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 1030 AM EST.
